//ç¬¬7æ¬¡èµ°è®¿ï¼Œ //é€‰å–å½“å‰æœªæ’åºå­é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­æœ€å¤§å€¼1å†’æ³¡åˆ°æœ€å ğŸ”ª ç®—æ³•å®ç° Javaå®ç° 123456789101112131415161718// swapprivate void swap(int[] array, int lIndex, int rIndex) { int tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// sort interfacepublic int[] bubbleSort(int[] nums) { int[] array = Arrays.copyOf(nums, nums.length); // bubble sort for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) { if (array[j] > array[j + 1]) swap(array, j, j + 1); } } return array;} JavaScriptå®ç° 1234567891011121314151617// swapconst swap = (array, lIndex, rIndex) => { const tmp = array[lIndex]; array[lIndex] = array[rIndex]; array[rIndex] = tmp;}// sort interfaceconst bubbleSort = nums => { const array = nums.slice(); // bubble sort for(let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { for(let j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) if(array[j] > array[j + 1]) swap(array, j, j + 1); } return array;}
